Client.Name: CSIRO , part of the Amazon Sustainability Data Initiative

Project.Brief history of your project and organi: We are specialized to assist Filecoin SP(Storage Provider) to store meaningful Data on Filecoin.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: CSIRO Climate retrospective Analysis and Forecast Ensemble system: version 1 (CAFE60v1) data. This product is part of the Amazon Sustainability Data Initiative and contains data sets that are publicly available for anyone to access and use. No subscription is required. Unless specifically stated in the applicable data set documentation, data sets available through the Amazon Sustainability Data Initiative are not provided and maintained by AWS.
Project.Please share a sample of the data (a lin:
